definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: Still, there were young men willing to ride for the Pony Express.
sentences.chinese: 儘管如此，仍然有年輕男士願意在驛馬快信公司當差。

sentences.english: Pony Express rider could do it in ten days.
sentences.chinese: 驛馬信使在十日之內就能把信送到。

sentences.english: Besides riders, other people helped run the Pony Express.
sentences.chinese: 除了騎士，經營驛馬快信公司還需要其他的人手。

sentences.english: The Pony Express was much faster than the stagecoach.
sentences.chinese: 驛馬快信要比當時的公共馬車快多了。

definition: to arrive home/facing one's home/home-coming/(soccer) facing the goalmouth
Tai Sui, God of the year/archaic name for the planet Jupiter 木星[Mu4 xing1]/nickname for sb who is the most powerful in an area
abundant harvest of all food crops/bumper grain harvest
to draw government pay/to be in public service/salary of an official
to assist a ruler in governing a country/prime minister
(of a political career) everything is going smoothly (idiom)
